Headline: Updated: Red Line No Trains Between Roosevelt and 35th
ShortDescription: Red Line service partially resumed, remains suspended between Roosevelt & 35th due to a police investigation.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Red Line has partially resumed, but remains suspended between Roosevelt and 35th due to a police investigation.

As a result, trains are operating as follows:

  • between Howard and Roosevelt, and,
  • between 35th and 95th, only.  

Shuttle buses are available between Roosevelt and 35th to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as the #29 State bus, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
